channel.title: Launcher Error
channel.description:
Failed to load the launcherDLL:
%1 not a valid Win32 Application
I'll try uninstalling and reinstalling BMS, let you know if that fixes it
Edit: Did a clean install, still got the same error
Looks like broke the 2007 Base....again

item.title: Launcher Error
item.dc:creator: Vinylshadow
item.description:
Yup, validating fixed it

huzzah, now I can get back to murdering the textures

whoohoo

Read full topic

item.title: Launcher Error
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
danielsangeo:

Try validating your Source SDK Base 2007 tool. (Library>Tools>Right-click SDK>Properties>Local Files>Verify Integrity of Tool Cache)

Agreed

Read full topic

item.title: Launcher Error
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Mine wasn’t. I got an error upon loading the game (and Source SDK Base 2007) from Steam:

CFileSystem_Steam::Init() failed: failed to find steam interface

So, I validated the Source SDK Base 2007 tool. It worked and I did a video stress test in Lost Coast (89FPS!) so I tried Black Mesa. It worked.

Try validating your Source SDK Base 2007 tool. (Library>Tools>Right-click SDK>Properties>Local Files>Verify Integrity of Tool Cache)

Read full topic

item.title: Launcher Error
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Doubt they broke it again, mine boots up fine.
Does the clean install include the SDK Base?
